name: @idearium/cli
description: The Idearium cli, which makes working with our projects much easier.

scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags
scripts.prerelease-release: npm version prerelease && npm publish --access=public && git push --follow-tags

author: Scott Mebberson
